entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
